humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there is metastatic ductal carcinoma found in one out of four assessed lymph nodes (1/4). This corresponds to the N1 stage based on the AJCC staging system (New Rule 12 and New Rule 15). The patient does not meet the criteria for N0, N2, or N3 stages based on the information provided in the report.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic ductal carcinoma in one out of four examined axillary lymph nodes (1/4). This corresponds to N1 stage according to the AJCC 7th edition TNM staging system.
